name: Sokotale
description:
Every day, you wake up and skilfully manoeuvre blocks into place.

Every day, you wonder to yourself why you are trapped in perpetuity.

Someday, you will have to take things into your own hands.

Someday, you must destroy the future.

Created in 2 weeks for the RevScarecrow game jam.
Made by Dawnyan (https://twitter.com/peachhugs) & Breadotop (https://twitter.com/breadotop)
